alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Lewis; Mason; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 12:17PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF MASON, ROBERTSON, NORTHWESTERN LEWIS, EASTERN BRACKEN, SOUTHEASTERN BROWN AND SOUTHWESTERN ADAMS COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 PM EDT... At 1217 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Brooksville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Georgetown, Washington, West Union, Manchester, Ripley, Aberdeen, Lewisburg, Tollesboro, Higginsport, Mount Olivet, Dover, Germantown, Sardis, Concord, Blue Licks Battlefield, Trinity, Murphysville, Burika and Alhambra. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
